spell_tooltip.description: Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 165,382 over 15 sec.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

enerates 0.5% Mana each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Places a ward on an ally that heals them for 55,913 the next time they take damage, and then jumps to another ally within 30 yds. Jumps up to 6 times and lasts 30 sec after each jump.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Psychic Scream by 15 sec.
Prayer of Mending does 45% increased healing to the initial target.
An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 50,077 Holy damage to enemies and up to 23,372 healing to allies within 13 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.
Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
Activating Fade removes all snare effects.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 3%.

Every 1 sec, the damage of your next Holy Nova is increased by 20% and its healing is increased by 20%. 

Stacks up to 20 times.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.
Summons shadowy tendrils, rooting all enemies within 8 yards for 15 sec or until the tendril is killed.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Increases your Leech by 2%.
Power Word: Shield and Leap of Faith increase your target's movement speed by 40% for 3 sec.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.
While above 75% health, the cast time of your Flash Heal, Heal, Prayer of Healing, and Smite are reduced by 10%.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
20% of Heal or Flash Heal healing on other targets also heals you.

Creates a ring of Holy energy around you that quickly expands to a 46 yd radius, healing allies for 158,924 and dealing 225,665 Holy damage to enemies.

Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.
Your healing spells and Smite have a 8% chance to make your next Flash Heal instant and cost no mana. Stacks to 2.
Increases the maximum health gained from Desperate Prayer by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Fade by 10 sec.
Increases the healing of your spells by 3%.
Swap health percentages with your ally. Increases the lower health percentage of the two to 25% if below that amount.
Increases the range of most spells by 15%.

Perform a miracle, healing an ally for 1.6 million.

ooldown reduced by 6 sec when you cast Heal or Flash Heal.

Releases miraculous light at a target location, healing up to 5 allies within 13 yds for 462,901.

ooldown reduced by 6 sec when you cast Prayer of Healing and by 2 sec when you cast Renew.

Calls upon a guardian spirit to watch over the friendly target for 10 sec, increasing healing received by 60%. If the target would die, the Spirit sacrifices itself and restores the target to 40% health.

Castable while stunned. Cannot save the target from massive damage.

Chastises the target for 299,581 Holy damage and incapacitates them for 4 sec.

ooldown reduced by 4 sec when you cast Smite or Holy Nova.

After Spirit of Redemption expires, you will revive at up to 100% health, based on your healing done during Spirit of Redemption. After reviving, you cannot benefit from Spirit of Redemption for 10 min.

Holy Word: Chastise causes your next 2 casts of Holy Fire to be instant, cost no mana, and incur no cooldown.

Refreshing Holy Fire on a target now extends its duration by 7 sec.
When Holy Word: Serenity or Holy Word: Sanctify finish their cooldown, you emit a burst of light that heals up to 5 injured targets within 46 yards for 87,868.

Prayer of Mending and Power Word: Life reduce the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity by 4 sec.

Halo and Divine Star reduce the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify by 4 sec.

Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.

Increases the damage of Holy Fire by 30%.

Holy Fire deals 75% of its initial damage to all nearby enemies within 12 yards of your target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.
Heal restores up to 15% additional health, based on your missing mana.

Heals all party or raid members within 46 yards for 1 million over 4.4 sec. Each heal increases all targets' healing taken by 4% for 15 sec, stacking.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
You regenerate mana 10% faster.
Your Prayer of Mending has a 12% chance to leave a Renew on each target it heals.
Your healing on allies with your Renew is increased by 6%.
Reduces the cooldown of Divine Hymn by 60 sec.
Bolster the morale of raid members within 46 yds. They each recover 30 sec of cooldown of a major defensive ability, and regain 10% of their missing mana, over 3.5 sec.
Prayer of Mending heals 4% more for each bounce remaining.
Increases the critical strike chance of Heal, Flash Heal, and Power Word: Life by 15%.
Gain a charge of your Holy Words, and enter a pure Holy form for 20 sec, increasing the cooldown reductions to your Holy Words by 200% and reducing their cost by 100%.
Prayer of Mending jumps 2 additional times.
Casting a Holy Word spell increases the healing of your next Flash Heal, Heal, Prayer of Healing, or Power Word: Life by 40%. Lasts 30 sec.
Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify gain an additional charge.

Your healing is increased by 10% while Apotheosis is active.

Casting Apotheosis causes your next 3 Heal or Prayer of Healing casts to be instant and heal for 25% more.
Reduces the cooldown of your Holy Words by 15 sec.
25% of healing done by Heal, Flash Heal, and Power Word: Life is replicated to the previous target you healed with those spells.

Increases the healing done by Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify by 40%.

Increases the radius of Holy Word: Sanctify by 30%.

Flash Heal reduces the cast time of your next Heal or Prayer of Healing within 20 sec by 30% and increases its healing done by 18%.

Can accumulate up to 4 charges.

Creates a Holy Lightwell. Every 1 sec the Lightwell will attempt to heal a nearby party or raid member within 46 yards that is lower than 75% health for 134,411 and apply a Renew to them for 6 sec. Lightwell lasts for 2 min or until it heals 15 times.

ooldown reduced by 3 sec when you cast Holy Word: Serenity or Holy Word: Sanctify.

When you use a Holy Word spell, you summon an image of a Naaru at your side. For 9 sec, whenever you cast a healing or damaging spell, the Naaru will cast a similar spell.

If an image has already been summoned, that image is empowered instead.

Casting Halo also causes you to create a Halo around you at 100% effectiveness every 5 sec for 10 sec.

Additionally, the radius of Halo is increased by 10 yards.
Your healing done is increased by 10% while Apotheosis is active.
Allies healed by your Halo receive 2% increased healing from you for 8 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Creating a Halo grants Surge of Light.
Halo damage reduces enemy movement speed by 5% for 5 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Power Word: Fortitude grants you an additional 5% stamina.
Increases the healing done by Flash Heals affected by Surge of Light by 30%.
Halo damage and healing is increased by 30%.
Your Power Infusion effect grants you an additional 10% haste.
Consuming Surge of Light reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify by 4 sec.
Halo now centers around you and returns to you after it reaches its maximum distance, healing allies and damaging enemies each time it passes through them.
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 165,382 over 15 sec.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

enerates 0.5% Mana each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Places a ward on an ally that heals them for 56,902 the next time they take damage, and then jumps to another ally within 30 yds. Jumps up to 6 times and lasts 30 sec after each jump.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Psychic Scream by 15 sec.

enerates 0.5% Mana each time the Shadowfiend attacks.

Stacks up to 20 times.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.
Dispels magic in a 15 yard radius, removing all harmful Magic from 5 friendly targets and 1 beneficial Magic effect from 5 enemy targets. Potent enough to remove Magic that is normally undispellable.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Reduces your target's physical damage taken by 5% for 15 sec after a critical heal with Flash Heal, Heal, or Holy Word: Serenity.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.

Increases the maximum health gained from Desperate Prayer by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Fade by 10 sec.
Increases the healing of your spells by 3%.
When an attack brings you below 30% health, you gain an absorption shield equal to 15% of your maximum health for 20 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 90 sec.
Attacks from your Shadowfiend siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 131,133.
Increases the range of most spells by 15%.

Perform a miracle, healing an ally for 1.6 million.

ooldown reduced by 6 sec when you cast Heal or Flash Heal.

Refreshing Holy Fire on a target now extends its duration by 7 sec.

Halo and Divine Star reduce the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify by 4 sec.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.

Your healing on allies with your Renew is increased by 6%.

Prayer of Mending heals 4% more for each bounce remaining.
Increases the critical strike chance of Heal, Flash Heal, and Power Word: Life by 15%.
Renew reduces the cooldown of Sanctify by an additional 6 sec and heals for 60% more when cast, but has a 12 sec cooldown.
Gain a charge of your Holy Words, and enter a pure Holy form for 20 sec, increasing the cooldown reductions to your Holy Words by 200% and reducing their cost by 100%.
Prayer of Mending jumps 2 additional times.
Casting a Holy Word spell increases the healing of your next Flash Heal, Heal, Prayer of Healing, or Power Word: Life by 40%. Lasts 30 sec.

Reduces the cooldown of your Holy Words by 15 sec.
25% of healing done by Heal, Flash Heal, and Power Word: Life is replicated to the previous target you healed with those spells.
The cooldowns of your Holy Words are reduced by an additional 10% when you cast the relevant spells.

Increases the healing done by Holy Word: Serenity and Holy Word: Sanctify by 40%.

Increases the radius of Holy Word: Sanctify by 30%.

Flash Heal reduces the cast time of your next Heal or Prayer of Healing within 20 sec by 30% and increases its healing done by 18%.

Can accumulate up to 4 charges.

When you use a Holy Word spell, you summon an image of a Naaru at your side. For 9 sec, whenever you cast a healing or damaging spell, the Naaru will cast a similar spell.

If an image has already been summoned, that image is empowered instead.
Your healing done is increased by 10% while Apotheosis is active.
Allies healed by your Halo receive 2% increased healing from you for 8 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Creating a Halo grants Surge of Light.
Psychic Scream creates an image of you at your location. After 4 sec, the image will let out a Psychic Scream.
Power Word: Fortitude grants you an additional 5% stamina.
Increases the healing done by Flash Heals affected by Surge of Light by 30%.
Halo damage and healing is increased by 30%.
Your Power Infusion effect grants you an additional 10% haste.
Consuming Surge of Light reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify by 4 sec.
Halo now centers around you and returns to you after it reaches its maximum distance, healing allies and damaging enemies each time it passes through them.
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 165,382 over 15 sec.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

enerates 0.5% Mana each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.

A word of dark binding that inflicts 104,205 Shadow damage to your target. If your target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, you take backlash damage equal to 5% of your maximum health.

Damage increased by 150% to targets below 20% health.
An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 48,875 Holy damage to enemies and up to 22,636 healing to allies within 13 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.
Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
If your Shadow Word: Death fails to kill a target at or below 20% health, its cooldown is reset. Cannot occur more than once every 10 sec.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 3%.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.

Controls a mind up to 1 level above yours for 30 sec while still controlling your own mind. Does not work versus Demonic, Mechanical, or Undead beings or players. This spell shares diminishing returns with other disorienting effects.
For 12 sec after casting Power Word: Shield, you deal 10% additional damage and healing with Smite and Holy Nova.
Dispels magic in a 15 yard radius, removing all harmful Magic from 5 friendly targets and 1 beneficial Magic effect from 5 enemy targets. Potent enough to remove Magic that is normally undispellable.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Increases your Leech by 2%.
Power Word: Shield and Leap of Faith increase your target's movement speed by 40% for 3 sec.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.

anguine Teachings
Sanguine Teachings grants an additional 2% Leech.

 ampiric Embrace
Reduces the cooldown of Vampiric Embrace by 30 sec, increases its healing done by 25%.
While above 75% health, the cast time of your Flash Heal, Heal, Prayer of Healing, and Smite are reduced by 10%.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
20% of Heal or Flash Heal healing on other targets also heals you.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.
Your healing spells and Smite have a 8% chance to make your next Flash Heal instant and cost no mana. Stacks to 2.
Increases the maximum health gained from Desperate Prayer by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Fade by 10 sec.
Increases the healing of your spells by 3%.
When an attack brings you below 30% health, you gain an absorption shield equal to 15% of your maximum health for 20 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 90 sec.
Attacks from your Shadowfiend siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 131,133.
Increases the range of most spells by 15%.

Power Word: Shield, Flash Heal, Renew, Power Word: Radiance, and Power Word: Life apply Atonement to your target for 15 sec.

Your spell damage heals all targets affected by Atonement for 35% of the damage done.

Healing increased by 100% when not in a raid.
A burst of light heals the target and 4 injured allies within 40 yards for 392,073, and applies Atonement for 60% of its normal duration.
Reduces all damage taken by a friendly target by 40% for 8 sec. Castable while stunned.
Shadow Word: Pain has a chance to empower your next Penance with Shadow, increasing its effectiveness by 30%.
Power Word: Radiance gains an additional charge.

Pain Suppression gains an additional charge.

Power Word: Shield reduces the cooldown of Pain Suppression by 3 sec.
Mind Blast has a 100% chance to grant Power of the Dark Side and its mana cost is reduced by 40%.
Mind Blast fractures the enemy's mind, increasing your spell damage to the target by 10% for 9 sec.
Reduces the cast time of Power Word: Radiance by 30% and causes it to apply Atonement at an additional 10% of its normal duration.
Summons a holy barrier to protect all allies at the target location for 10 sec, reducing all damage taken by 20% and preventing damage from delaying spellcasting.
Each Penance bolt extends the duration of Shadow Word: Pain on enemies hit by 1.5 sec.
Shadow Word: Pain Spreads to a nearby enemy when you cast Penance on the target.
Extends Atonement on all allies by 6 sec and heals for 4.2 million, split evenly among them.
Casting Shadowfiend enters you into a shadowy pact, transforming Halo, Divine Star, and Penance into Shadow spells and increasing the damage and healing of your Shadow spells by 25% while active.
Shadow Word: Pain deals 5% additional damage and spreads to 1 additional target when you cast Penance to its target.
Rapture enhances 2 additional shields.
Shadow Covenant increases Shadow spell damage and healing by an additional 10%.

Ascend into the air and unleash a massive barrage of Penance bolts, causing 1.8 million Holy damage to enemies or 5.8 million healing to allies over 5.3 sec.

While ascended, gain a shield for 100% of your health. In addition, you are unaffected by knockbacks or crowd control effects.
Atonement heals for 10% more when activated by Shadow spells.
Flash Heal, Power Word: Shield, Penance, Power Word: Radiance, and Power Word: Life have a 20% increased chance to critically heal.
Atonement reduces damage taken by 3%.
Reduces the cooldown of Shadowfiend or Mindbender by 50%.
The damage of Smite and Penance is increased by 15%, and Penance increases or decreases your target's movement speed by 50% for 2 sec.
Power Word: Radiance causes your next Penance to fire 2 additional bolts, stacking up to 2 charges.
Mind Blast and Shadow Word: Death cause your Mindbender or Shadowfiend to teleport behind your target, slashing up to 5 nearby enemies for 64,563 Shadow damage and extending its duration by 0.7 sec.

Your Penance bolts increase the damage of your next Smite by 20%, or the absorb of your next Power Word: Shield by 10%.

Stacks up to 8 times.

Summons a Mindbender to attack the target for 12 sec. 

enerates 0.2% Mana each time the Mindbender attacks.
While Entropic Rift is active, you move 20% faster.

Entropic Rift upgrades Smite into Void Blast while it is active.

oid Blast:
Sends a blast of cosmic void energy at the enemy, causing 162,265 Shadow damage.
Power Word: Shield absorbs 20% additional damage.
Shadow Word: Death consumes absorb shields from your target, dealing 306,140 extra damage to them and granting you 1% mana if a shield was present.
Void Blast increases the duration of Entropic Rift by 1.0 sec, up to a maximum of 3 sec.

Transform your Shadowfiend or Mindbender into a Voidwraith.

oidwraith
Summon a Voidwraith for 15 sec that casts Void Flay from afar. Void Flay deals bonus damage to high health enemies, up to a maximum of 50% if they are full health.

enerates 0.5% Mana each time the Voidwraith attacks.
While Entropic Rift is active, your Atonement healing is increased by 20%.
Void Blast generates 100% additional Insanity.
You absorb 3% of all magic damage taken. Absorbing Shadow damage heals you for 100% of the amount absorbed.

Each time Penance damages or heals, Entropic Rift is empowered, increasing its damage and size by 20%.

After Entropic Rift ends it collapses, dealing 338,272 Shadow damage split amongst enemy targets within 15 yds.
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 165,382 over 15 sec.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

enerates 0.5% Mana each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.

A word of dark binding that inflicts 103,372 Shadow damage to your target. If your target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, you take backlash damage equal to 5% of your maximum health.

Damage increased by 150% to targets below 20% health.
An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 49,806 Holy damage to enemies and up to 23,378 healing to allies within 13 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.
Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.
If your Shadow Word: Death fails to kill a target at or below 20% health, its cooldown is reset. Cannot occur more than once every 10 sec.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 3%.

Every 1 sec, the damage of your next Holy Nova is increased by 20% and its healing is increased by 20%. 

Stacks up to 20 times.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.

Controls a mind up to 1 level above yours for 30 sec while still controlling your own mind. Does not work versus Demonic, Mechanical, or Undead beings or players. This spell shares diminishing returns with other disorienting effects.
Dispels magic in a 15 yard radius, removing all harmful Magic from 5 friendly targets and 1 beneficial Magic effect from 5 enemy targets. Potent enough to remove Magic that is normally undispellable.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Increases your Leech by 2%.
Reduces the mana cost of Purify and Mass Dispel by 50% and Dispel Magic by 10%.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.

anguine Teachings
Sanguine Teachings grants an additional 2% Leech.

 ampiric Embrace
Reduces the cooldown of Vampiric Embrace by 30 sec, increases its healing done by 25%.
While above 75% health, the cast time of your Flash Heal, Heal, Prayer of Healing, and Smite are reduced by 10%.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
20% of Heal or Flash Heal healing on other targets also heals you.

Creates a ring of Holy energy around you that quickly expands to a 46 yd radius, healing allies for 156,170 and dealing 222,974 Holy damage to enemies.

Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.
Your healing spells and Smite have a 8% chance to make your next Flash Heal instant and cost no mana. Stacks to 2.
Increases the maximum health gained from Desperate Prayer by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Fade by 10 sec.
Increases the healing of your spells by 3%.
Attacks from your Shadowfiend siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 131,133.
Increases the range of most spells by 15%.

Power Word: Shield, Flash Heal, Renew, Power Word: Radiance, and Power Word: Life apply Atonement to your target for 15 sec.

Your spell damage heals all targets affected by Atonement for 35% of the damage done.

Healing increased by 100% when not in a raid.
A burst of light heals the target and 4 injured allies within 40 yards for 395,761, and applies Atonement for 60% of its normal duration.
Reduces all damage taken by a friendly target by 40% for 8 sec. Castable while stunned.
Shadow Word: Pain has a chance to empower your next Penance with Shadow, increasing its effectiveness by 30%.
Power Word: Radiance gains an additional charge.

Pain Suppression gains an additional charge.

Power Word: Shield reduces the cooldown of Pain Suppression by 3 sec.
Mind Blast has a 100% chance to grant Power of the Dark Side and its mana cost is reduced by 40%.
Mind Blast fractures the enemy's mind, increasing your spell damage to the target by 10% for 9 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Power Word: Radiance by 3 sec.
Summons a holy barrier to protect all allies at the target location for 10 sec, reducing all damage taken by 20% and preventing damage from delaying spellcasting.
Each Penance bolt extends the duration of Shadow Word: Pain on enemies hit by 1.5 sec.
Shadow Word: Pain Spreads to a nearby enemy when you cast Penance on the target.
Extends Atonement on all allies by 6 sec and heals for 4.2 million, split evenly among them.
Casting Shadowfiend enters you into a shadowy pact, transforming Halo, Divine Star, and Penance into Shadow spells and increasing the damage and healing of your Shadow spells by 25% while active.
Shadow Word: Pain deals 5% additional damage and spreads to 1 additional target when you cast Penance to its target.
Atonements granted by Power Word: Shield last an additional 4 sec.
Shadow Covenant increases Shadow spell damage and healing by an additional 10%.

Ascend into the air and unleash a massive barrage of Penance bolts, causing 1.8 million Holy damage to enemies or 5.7 million healing to allies over 5.3 sec.

While ascended, gain a shield for 100% of your health. In addition, you are unaffected by knockbacks or crowd control effects.
Atonement heals for 10% more when activated by Shadow spells.
Flash Heal, Power Word: Shield, Penance, Power Word: Radiance, and Power Word: Life have a 20% increased chance to critically heal.
Reduces the cooldown of Shadowfiend or Mindbender by 50%.
The damage of Smite and Penance is increased by 15%, and Penance increases or decreases your target's movement speed by 50% for 2 sec.
Power Word: Radiance causes your next Penance to fire 2 additional bolts, stacking up to 2 charges.
Mind Blast and Shadow Word: Death cause your Mindbender or Shadowfiend to teleport behind your target, slashing up to 5 nearby enemies for 64,563 Shadow damage and extending its duration by 0.7 sec.

Your Penance bolts increase the damage of your next Smite by 20%, or the absorb of your next Power Word: Shield by 10%.

Stacks up to 8 times.

Summons a Mindbender to attack the target for 12 sec. 

enerates 0.2% Mana each time the Mindbender attacks.
While Entropic Rift is active, you move 20% faster.

Entropic Rift upgrades Smite into Void Blast while it is active.

oid Blast:
Sends a blast of cosmic void energy at the enemy, causing 159,615 Shadow damage.
Power Word: Shield absorbs 20% additional damage.
Shadow Word: Death consumes absorb shields from your target, dealing 308,747 extra damage to them and granting you 1% mana if a shield was present.
Summoning an Entropic Rift grants you Mind Devourer.

Transform your Shadowfiend or Mindbender into a Voidwraith.

oidwraith

enerates 0.5% Mana each time the Voidwraith attacks.

Void Blast generates 100% additional Insanity.
You absorb 3% of all magic damage taken. Absorbing Shadow damage heals you for 100% of the amount absorbed.

enerates 0.5% Mana each time the Shadowfiend attacks.

Critical strikes increase the damage by 100%.
Silences the target, preventing them from casting spells for 4 sec. Against non-players, also interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 4 sec.

enerates 12 Insanity.
